channel.title: ThrillScape!
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to ThrillScape.
DOWNLOAD You can Download it from here:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?e5svbghk0ayx3yd]DOWNLOAD[/url]
Standout Features - 100% Combat - 100% Jad (One Wave) - 100% Fight Pits - 100% Assault! - 100% All Godswords spec - 100% DRAGON CLAWS - 100% All other specs work! - 100% Godwars - Complete King Black Dragon! - 474 interfaces! - CUSTOM HOME - Customs + Bonuses! - Welcome interface WITH rules! - Working Clue Scrolls! - DONATOR Area! - AND LOADS MORE!
--- Extra Features/Details ---
Melee 474 godswords with specials 474 Whip emote WITH special 474 Cast "Vengeance" works & GFX 474 Veng Other Emote/GFX. 474 Defender Blocks Dragon Claws work with special! x2 on NPC's, x4 on players Melee Following 100%.
Magic 100% autocast Barrages immediately Magic following Blitz set to 4 seconds 474 magic books WITH normal, ancient & lunar
Range 474 Crossbow emote Correct bow GFX! Range Following Diamond bolts & Ruby bolts GFX
NPC Animated Bandos boss WITH Minions. Animated Zamorak boss WITH Minions. Animated Saradomin Boss WITH Minions. Animated Armadyl boss WITH Minions.
Minigames 100% Pest Control 100% Jad - ONE wave - ANIMATED 100% Fight Pits 100% Barrows Working FunPK!
Shops Updated shops AND added new home Donator Shop Pure Shop Moving shops! Talk to/trade NPC's!
Interface Custom Quest interface! 474 Equipment Interface 474 kept on death interface Respondent Sprits [/center]
